channel.title: Comments on: An interview with Courtney Bender- New Metaphysicals
channel.description: notes on Jewish theology and spirituality

item.title: By: reiki63
item.dc:creator: reiki63
item.description:
I consider this article very interesting and rich in content, would also be very nice to discuss issues that are present in this paper. They still agree with what you said and I believe we can always find new ideas for improvement. Thank you very much to enable the vision of my post. thanks again
Dott.Lorenzo Dall'Olio Usui and Karuna Reiki Master
item.content:encoded:
I consider this article very interesting and rich in content, would also be very nice to discuss issues that are present in this paper.
They still agree with what you said and I believe we can always find new ideas for improvement.
Thank you very much to enable the vision of my post.
thanks again

Dott.Lorenzo Dall’Olio
Usui and Karuna Reiki Master
